name: Dead Man's Cheese Ball
author: LUSCIOUSLEMONADE
summary: Serve this black cheese ball with blue corn chips or dark rye toast for a ghastly presentation. It's punchy, just like you'd expect cheese of the dead to taste. You can find black sesame seeds at a reasonable price at most Asian markets.
ingredients: 1 ¼ pounds sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded
¼ cup butter, melted and cooled
directions: In the container of a food processor, combine the Cheddar cheese, sour cream, butter, horseradish, hot mustard, chipotle sauce, garlic and port wine
You can use a potato masher in a large bowl but it will take longer
Line a bowl with plastic wrap, and fill with the cheese mixture
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or overnight
Toast the sesame seeds in a dry skillet over medium heat just until fragrant, about 3 minutes
Gather the plastic wrap around the cheese mixture and form into a ball
Remove the plastic wrap and roll the ball in sesame seeds to coat
Place in the center of a platter and surround with your favorite chips or crackers
